thread.section_title: Woman caught ‘relieving herself’ over wall outside school – Metro
thread.title: Woman caught ‘relieving herself’ over wall outside school
thread.title_full: Woman caught ‘relieving herself’ over wall outside school

author: Jen
title: Woman caught ‘relieving herself’ over wall outside school
text:
(Picture: SWNS) A woman was filmed with her trousers down, apparently using a wall outside a school as a toilet. 
In the video, the unnamed woman perches over the wall, seemingly unconcerned that the Abbey Infant School was nearby.
Man punishes himself with 220 antique torture instruments he owns Factory worker Matty Rumsby, 21, said he was shocked to see it on Sunday.
‘It was approximately 7pm, I was in the car with my friend, and as we turned onto Toler Road this woman was pulling her trousers down, she saw us watch her doing it,’ he said.
He took out his iPhone to film it because he said he was so concerned.
‘We stopped in shock and me and my friend were quite disgusted,’ Matty said.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
‘We stopped the car and I undid the window and asked her what she was doing, she completely ignored me and just carried on doing what she was doing.
‘In my disgust, with it being next to a school, my friend told me to get my phone out.’
'Penis seat' for men appears on public transport - but for an important reason After recording the video in Nuneaton, Warwickshire, Mr Rumsby posted it onto his Facebook page.
Someone can be heard in the video shouting at the woman: ‘You’re a scumbag, go to the toilet.’
Mr Rumsby added “I didn’t go back to look but due to how she was sat on the wall and the time she was there it seemed like she was having a poo.
‘Whether it was that or she was urinating, it is still highly revolting.
‘I didn’t believe it would get so much of a reaction, I only uploaded it because she deserves to be shamed as it’s next to a school.’
